sect2.title: More modules

row.entry: More modules at the bottom of right panel is used to hide modules you don't use, as default only standard modules are shown to the user so if you are missing anything you should check here and show it.

sect2.para: Each modules is shown as a small icon, hover mouse pointer over the button to show the name. You can toggle a module by clicking the button to show/hide and add modules favorite modules group. The icon background color indicates the status: dark grey for hidden modules, light grey for visible modules, red for favorite modules.
